synopsis.text:
Can humanity triumph against colossal alien adversaries? Set in the late 21st century, the world thrives on a revolutionary energy source, Divine Grace Energy, propelling Earth's economy and enabling space colonization. However, the first manned mission to Pluto takes a disastrous turn when the crew is ambushed by a colossal life-form, the Nergal. In response, the Earth Alliance Army unearths ancient robot weapons, the G's Frames, and enlists unique individuals known as Ancient Girls to pilot them against the Nergal.

Years after a devastating battle at Jupiter, Reika Minamiya, the younger sister of a missing pilot, joins the AG Unit in search of her sister and to defend Earth. Elsewhere, Li Xinglan, another Ancient Girl, seeks to find her own missing sister and master the control of her G's Frame, Shennong. As alien attacks intensify, these courageous young women must hone their skills and forge unbreakable bonds to protect their loved ones and the future of humanity. Will they rise to the challenge and unlock the true potential of their ancient robot weapons?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
